sense.gloss: car, automobile, motorcar, motor vehicle, auto
rolling stock, railroad cars, wheeled vehicles
boarding (a train, bus, etc.), getting into (e.g. a taxi)
alighting (from a train, bus, etc.), getting off, getting out (of a car)
stopping (of a train, car, etc.), stop
(one's) beloved car (or motorcycle, bicycle, etc.), (one's) wheels
starfish, sea star, asteroid, any echinoderm of the class Asteroidea

sdata.j: ↑電車↑↓でんしゃ↓が↑停↑↓とま↓まるまで↑開↑↓あ↓けないで。
sdata.e: Don't open before the train stops.

sdata.e: It's so hot that you could cook an egg on the hood of a car.
